City Council Place 3 - Mayor Pro-Tem
====================================

**Mayor Pro-Tem Josh M. Fultz, Place 3
![DSC01378](https://www.navasotatx.gov/City%20council/New%20Council%20Headshots/DSC01378.jpg?t=20250519105132)
E-mail:**
[jfultz@navasotatx.gov](mailto:jfultz@navasotatx.gov)
**Phone:**
(936) 825-6475
Josh graduated from Navasota High School in 1996. After high school, Josh attended Sam Houston State University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Criminal Justice. He worked for the Judicial District Community Supervision and Corrections Department for Grimes County before returning to his passion for service in hospitality.
Josh currently is employed at Camp Allen Conference and Retreat Center. He serves as the Director of Conference Center Services which puts him in contact with over 54,000 guests a year to the Navasota area. Josh enjoys working directly with guests to ensure a safe and enjoyable stay.
Josh comes from a long line of previous councilman and public servants. With a lifelong connection to the community he has been taught to treat others as he would want to be treated, and to serve wholeheartedly to all. Josh began volunteering for his community at age 10.

* Navasota Theatre Alliance, President (age 17)
* Navasota Blues Fest, Board Member
* Jerry Lewis MDA Telethon, Fundraising Volunteer
* Navasota City Manager Selection Committee

* Texas Chargers (Charge Syndrome), Vice-President
* Stone Ridge HOA, President
* City of Navasota, Councilman
